Hero.description: LeaseChat helps you analyze your lease, chat with AI about what it means, explain the law in your city and state, and write letters to your landlord to protect yourself. For free.

Creator.institution: University of Chicago Law School â€¢ AI Lab

features.title: Everything you need to know your rights
features.subtitle: Powerful tools to help you understand your lease and communicate with your landlord.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Lease Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Get instant AI analysis of your lease. Upload your PDF and receive a full report in under 2 minutes.

aiChat.title: Chat with AI
aiChat.description: Ask questions and get instant answers with context from your lease document.

stateLaws.title: State Renter Laws
stateLaws.description: Comprehensive coverage for all 50 states with city-specific regulations.

letterGeneration.title: Letter Generation
letterGeneration.description: Professional templates for landlord communication including deposit returns and repairs.

unfairCharges.title: Caught Unfair Charges
unfairCharges.subtitle: Discover hidden fees
unfairCharges.heading: Spot unfair charges before you pay
unfairCharges.description: Upload your lease and LeaseWise's AI instantly identifies questionable fees, security deposit violations, and charges that may violate local tenant laws. Get specific statute citations to back up your claims.

gettingRepairs.title: Getting Repairs Done
gettingRepairs.subtitle: Force landlord action
gettingRepairs.heading: Know your repair and maintenance rights
gettingRepairs.description: Understand exactly what your landlord is responsible for and the legal timeline they must follow. Generate professional repair request letters with legal backing from your state's tenant law.

breakingLease.title: Breaking Your Lease
breakingLease.subtitle: Understand penalties
breakingLease.heading: Break your lease the right way
breakingLease.description: Planning to leave early? LeaseWise analyzes your lease to show you exactly what it will cost, your legal obligations, and valid reasons that may let you break the lease penalty-free under state law.

beforeSigning.title: Reviewing Before Signing
beforeSigning.subtitle: Catch issues early
beforeSigning.heading: Review before you sign
beforeSigning.description: Get your lease analyzed before you commit. Our AI reviews every clause, highlights potential red flags, and ensures you understand exactly what you're agreeing toâ€”before it's too late.

testimonials.title: What renters are saying
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of renters who are protecting their rights

review1.name: Sarah M.

review6.name: Alex P.

review8.name: Lisa H.
review8.quote: Caught several red flags before signing my lease. Dodged a bullet!

cta.heading: Start protecting your rights today
cta.subtitle: Free AI-powered lease analysis trusted by renters nationwide

aiAnalysis.title: Get instant AI analysis of your lease
aiAnalysis.description: Upload your PDF and get a full report in under 2 minutes. Our AI scans every clause, spots potential issues, and delivers a clear summary you can actually use.
aiAnalysis.stat1Description: Fast analysis that explains what matters most in plain English.
aiAnalysis.stat2Description: Up-to-date data helps you make informed decisions.

aiChat.title: Chat with AI about your lease
aiChat.description: Understand any clause by chatting with AI trained to read your lease. Ask anything, from pet policies to lease breaks, and get clear answers fast.
aiChat.stat1Description: Get answers to specific questions in seconds with cited sources.
aiChat.stat2Description: AI remembers your conversation and understands your lease details.

stateLaws.title: Understand your stateâ€™s renter laws
stateLaws.description: See exactly which state and city laws apply to you. Learn about the rules around security-deposits, lease terminations, maintenance obligations, and legal protections in your state and city.
stateLaws.stat1Description: Complete coverage of renter laws across all US states with city-specific regulations.
stateLaws.stat2Description: Current legal information with sources cited, so you always have reliable renter law guidance.

marketData.title: Generate letters to help with your rental issues
marketData.description: Need repairs to your apartment? Want to get your deposit back? Get tailored, professional-quality letters to address issues with your landlord, lease, or repairs.
marketData.stat1Description: Comprehensive topics for letter-generation, from repair requests to deposit disputes.
marketData.stat2Description: Developed by the University of Chicago Law Schoolâ€™s AI Lab with expert-backed insight.

Disclaimer.text: This is a beta product. It uses AI and may provide incorrect information. Anything you upload may be shared with ChatGPT. Do not upload sensitive personal information. LeaseChat provides legal information, not legal advice, and does not create an attorney-client relationship. LeaseChat is not your attorney.

form.additionalDetailsPlaceholder: Add any specific details about damages, cleaning, or other relevant information...
form.paymentDateHelp: When will you be able to make the full payment?
form.partialPaymentHelp: If you can make a partial payment on the due date, enter the amount here
form.repairIssuePlaceholder: e.g., Leaking faucet in kitchen, broken window in bedroom, etc.
form.repairIssuesHelp: Describe each issue that needs to be repaired. You can add more as needed.
form.emergencyIssuePlaceholder: e.g., Major water leak flooding apartment, no heat in winter, electrical sparking, broken door lock compromising security, etc.
form.emergencyIssueHelp: Describe the urgent safety or habitability issue that requires immediate attention.
form.moveOutDateHelp: If different from your lease end date, specify when you plan to move out.

LegalLetters.disclaimer: This letter is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice. Consider consulting with an attorney for your specific situation.
